main event: A Park Police Officer observed an unidentified object hovering in the sky for about twenty minutes.
interesting points: The object was approximately twenty feet in length and had a whitish light underside., The object was stationary with no visible means of propulsion., It eventually descended slowly and vanished behind a building., It emitted a sound similar to radio interference when taking off., One witness described the object as having a dome on top with an iridescent underside.
